title: Fix misleading comments about merge target
description: Two comments incorrectly say 'to main': internal/parallel/runner.go:27 (MergeManager comment) and internal/worktree/merge.go:39 (MergeManager struct comment). Should say 'to target branch' or similar.
closed_reason: Changed MergeManager comments from 'to main' to 'to their target branch' in internal/parallel/runner.go:27 and internal/worktree/merge.go:39
